did.unittitle: Philoine Fried Collection of Sidney and Bessie Hillman Additional Documents and Memorabilia, 1920-1950
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor- Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Assorted documents and memorabilia of Sidney and Bessie Hillman.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of assorted documents and memorabilia of Sidney and Bessie Hillman. Included are a telegram, memorandum, printed material, immigration documents, and materials relating to the construction of the Sidney Hillman Mausoleum.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Philoine Fried Collection of Sidney and Bessie Hillman Additional Documents and Memorabilia #6064m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
